features: VERSATILITY OF 3 IN 1 APPLIANCE The Combi Wave 3 in 1, combines an Air Fryer, Convection Oven and Microwave in one appliance to create delicious healthier meals for every cooking occasions. Create crunchy, crispy golden French fries with the Air Fry function; enjoy family favorites such as roast chicken or gooey chocolate brownies with the Convection Oven function; or defrost delicious soup and reheat your lasagna with the Inverter Microwave function.

ELEMENT IQ SYSTEM Smart algorithms steer power to where and when its needed to create the ideal cooking environment, for perfect results. Enjoy crispy golden results and many more delicious meals when using the Air Fry and Bake functions. Power: 1200 W - Convection Input Power

FAST COMBI & COOK FROM FROZEN FUNCTIONS The Fast Combi function is designed to cook your favorite dishes faster. Combining Convection Oven, Grilling and Microwave to achieve the desired temperature and perfect results faster than traditional ovens. The Cook from Frozen function is designed to achieve perfectly cooked results from frozen. The function uses the convection oven, grill and microwave at different cooking stages.

POWER SMOOTHING INVERTER The Power Smoothing Inverter technology does away with the old ON-OFF method to automatically adjust power intensity and deliver smooth even power when you need more or less, for deliciously even results. Reheat favorites like pizza slices, soup and lasagna with precision and ease or delicately defrost meats and meals without overheating and drying out edges.

SMART COOK, SMART REHEAT & SMART DEFROST With 19 built-in smart presets including Smart Cook, Smart Reheat and Smart Defrost, the Combi Wave 3 in 1 puts all the power at your fingertips. Smooth low temperature delivers heat evenly without overheating and drying out, allowing you to cook with ease, reheat with precision and delicately defrost your favorite dishes.
body.description: Air Fryer, Convection Oven & Microwave. Welcome to a new world of power and versatility. Delicious family favorites with Air Fryer, Convection Oven and Inverter Microwave at your fingertips. Our Element iQ system steers power to where and when it’s needed to create the ideal cooking environment, for perfect results. The Combi Wave 3 in 1 also features Fast Combi and Cook from Frozen presets along with clever shortcuts, all designed to make life easier in the kitchen. VERSATILITY OF 3 IN 1 APPLIANCE The Combi Wave 3 in 1, combines an Air Fryer, Convection Oven and Microwave in one appliance to create delicious healthier meals for every cooking occasions. Create crunchy, crispy golden French fries with the Air Fry function; enjoy family favorites such as roast chicken or gooey chocolate brownies with the Convection Oven function; or defrost delicious soup and reheat your lasagna with the Inverter Microwave function. ELEMENT IQ SYSTEM Smart algorithms steer power to where and when its needed to create the ideal cooking environment, for perfect results. Enjoy crispy golden results and many more delicious meals when using the Air Fry and Bake functions. FAST COMBI & COOK FROM FROZEN FUNCTIONS The Fast Combi function is designed to cook your favorite dishes faster. Combining Convection Oven, Grilling and Microwave to achieve the desired temperature and perfect results faster than traditional ovens. The Cook from Frozen function is designed to achieve perfectly cooked results from frozen. The function uses the convection oven, grill and microwave at different cooking stages. POWER SMOOTHING INVERTER The Power Smoothing Inverter technology does away with the old ON-OFF method to automatically adjust power intensity and deliver smooth even power when you need more or less, for deliciously even results. Reheat favorites like pizza slices, soup and lasagna with precision and ease or delicately defrost meats and meals without overheating and drying out edges. SMART COOK, SMART REHEAT & SMART DEFROST With 19 built-in smart presets including Smart Cook, Smart Reheat and Smart Defrost, the Combi Wave 3 in 1 puts all the power at your fingertips. Smooth low temperature delivers heat evenly without overheating and drying out, allowing you to cook with ease, reheat with precision and delicately defrost your favorite dishes. SOFT CLOSE DOOR & QUIETER OPERATION The Combi Wave 3 in 1 is engineered with a soft close door. Clever touches like child lock, Breville sound suite and mute button means less beeps, bumps and clangs, and more pops, bites and crunches. SHORTCUTS & ONE TOUCH AUTO SETTINGS The shortcuts panel on the inside door of the Combi Wave 3 in 1 is cleverly designed for commonly used tasks such as melting chocolate, softening butter, popping popcorn and more. Set your favorites with one touch and get delicious results every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wow, amazing and efficient
reviews.reviewText: looks gorgeous and works wonders, higher price point but worth it. bought three more matching appliances from breville. we are loving them all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The reason i bought it primarily because it is quiet when shut the door and it is also quiet when cooking, interior is stainless steel looks beautiful and easy to clean, i have tried and air fryer works very well except it is bit small not very easy to take out the food, and after microwave done the cooling fan will keep running a bit this is different, but i guess it is good the machine itself...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent but weak
reviews.reviewText: It does everything advertised but slower and weaker. The toaster feature only cooks one side of the bread. Microwaving takes about a third longer than comparable units. Very well built and saves space by combining functions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I allowed myself a couple of months of use before reviewing.This is a fantastic combo microwave/oven/air fryer. The oven and air fryer work beautifully. I also have had no issues with the microwave function either. It's easy to clean out. The soft close is perfect. The noise is barely audible. I have to check every now and then to make sure it's still going (my GFCI outlet randomly trips occasionally and needs to be reset. Something about the crappy building wiring. 🙄) My only complaint is the end beep is quite loud even on the lowest setting. Yet, because of the barely audible noise when it's running, I keep the end beep on so that I know when things are done. I have no major complaints. I've made chicken, biscuits, steak, roast, veggies, etc and no issues so far.Before I purchased it I read quite a number of reviews stating it takes longer to heat/cook food. And that's true to some extent but it's not ridiculously so. Adding an additional 30 seconds (1 minute of I want it really piping hot) to reheat a meal. And a few additional minutes to the oven or air fryer. I made biscuits last night and I added an additional 2.5 minutes to the oven time as I wanted them to brown a bit more. Made some air fryer chicken wings and added another 5 minutes. Things cook differently across various appliances, constantly opening the door, the interior size of the appliance, the appliance power and even the environment you're cooking in all play a part in cooking time. You have to learn how to adjust your cooking times accordingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Had high hopes for this but it’s disappointing
reviews.reviewText: More updates. It’s terrible. Overall it’s very disappointing product and we own serval from Breville. First the door feels cheap and plastic like. The soft door close is ok but my last one felt more solid when you opened and closed it. Also the air fryer’s lowest temperature is 400. Somethings I air fry cook at 350-375. I used it on some shrimp that said cook at 375. They came out hard and not good with the Breville. You cannot adjust a lot of the preset menu items. Like popcorn. It only has a setting for a 3.2 oz bag. I have individual bags that are 1.2 oz. So they over cook and burn if you leave them in the full time for the larger bag. The microwave also cooks slower than my previous one. So what use to take me 2 mins to cook now takes 2 mins 30 secs to cook. The bell that tells you when it’s done also only rings once, so you run the risk of not hearing it even if you turn it up. My last one ringed about 4 times in a row and then repeated in about 30 secs. I have not tried the combi cook or convection yet but not hopeful that it will be any better. Also there was no clear description of how many watts the microwave was. Depending on the site I found it ranged from 900-1200. I am more inclined to think it’s like 700 based on the slow cooking time for the microwave. And this is all after just owning it a few days. But it does look cute on my counter. But I don’t recommend it. Over priced for what it does. Tried to make chicken nuggets I. The air fryer. Using I cool these at 375 for 10-12 mins. I tried it at 400 and after 10 mins half frozen. Turned it up to 450 cooled another 10 mins. Hot and soggy. Not crispy like my old air fryer. Overall. Don’t buy. I am wondering if I can return it even without the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Since I got this microwave I’ve been using it nonstop! The ease and convenience of it doing multiple functions really shortens the time to make food. I have made potato gratin, steamed veggies, yams and other hard veggies, chicken, salmon, bbq ribs, rice, etc. You do have to get used to the cooking times requires and generally I undercooked the food just a tad and while it stands it finished cooking.Hands down this was faster than the oven and if you are only doing one oven dish this is the way to go.Some reviews complained about the microwave function being lower, and this is true. You need to cook food a little longer to get it super hot but we are talking about 30 secs so it’s really no big deal in my opinion.The combo oven is easy to operate and has useful presets, I use one of the settings daily. I have not used the air fryer function yet so cannot speak to that but I have regularly used the other functions and think they work well.It is pricey but if you need an applicable that shortens your time in the kitchen and gets the job done, this is it! Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is a pretty cool machine
reviews.reviewText: Nice machine. It does what it says it will. :)

Su punto fuerte es recalentar comida sin que se seque. Como horno microondas es bueno a secas. Como freidora de aire es un poco más tardada que otras, aunque esto se entiende por el volumen interior del horno.El horno en sí es bastante espacioso, lo cual puede ser un problema en cocinas pequeñas. Yo tuve que conseguir una mesa a la medida para poder montarlo.En general es muy buen producto. Solo lamento que llegó un poco doblado de la parte de atrás. Seguramente se dañó durante el envío. Esto no afecta su funcionamiento y dado a como está instalado ni siquiera es posible observar ese defecto.
So happy with this purchase! It does virtually everything and is a great addition to my kitchen!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Dejo de funcionar después de 4 meses
reviews.reviewText: El horno dejo de funcionar 4 meses despues de la compra. Breville no da servicio a este producto en México. El vendedor y Amazon ayudaron a conseguir una solución.

Première utisation la pizza à brûléA partir de la deuxième utililisation un code d'erreur apparaît et l'appareil s'arrête. De plus ce code n'apparaît pas dans la partie dépannage du manuel d'instruction.Un livre de recettes proposées reliées aux différentes fonction de l'appareil serait un atout majeur, surtout au prix d'achat de ce dernier.L'ai retourné et ne suis pas certain de le commander à nouveau, surtout au prix régulier.
